author: Jathon Sapsford
title: Trump Tweets Special Counsel Investigation Getting ‘Ridiculous’ - WSJ
text:
President Donald Trump in a series of tweets Sunday morning criticized special counsel Robert Mueller’s investigation into foreign meddling in the 2016 election, following reports the probe has expanded beyond Russia to look more closely into actors from the Middle East.
Mr. Trump’s tweets said, in part, “the World’s most expensive Witch Hunt has found nothing on Russia & me so now they are looking at the rest of the World!”
